meanings.definition: A large African mammal with black and white stripes.
meanings.sent1: Zebras are beautiful animals with stripes.
meanings.sent2: I saw a herd of zebras at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The zebras at the safari were having a striped fashion show.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the zebras looked like moving piano keys.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the zebras' unique patterns.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the zebras in the field!
meanings.sent2: The zebras grazed peacefully in the grassland.
meanings.sent3: The zebras decided to form a band and call themselves 'The Striped Crew'.
meanings.sent4: The zebras in the herd stood out like a group of referees.
meanings.sent5: The safari guide pointed out the zebras as the stars of the savanna.
